messages.title: Speaking Up for You in Aberdeen South
messages.content: “After years of deep division over Brexit and Independence, we need a Labour Government committed to tackling climate change, ending poverty and working for a fairer and more equal society. If you agree it is time to move on, I would welcome your support.”

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Giving You the Final Say on Brexit
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will give the people the final say on Brexit, and the chance to vote to Remain in the EU.
We believe Scotland should Remain in the UK, and will oppose another independence referendum.
Labour will use the skills and expertise of North Sea oil workers to help deliver a zero-carbon economy.
Labour will invest in council housing and the NHS, and bring vital services into public ownership.
We will bring in a real living wage of £10 an hour, and will scrap the failed system of Universal Credit.

community.content: Labour will invest in council housing.

Labour will invest in council housing.
